scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=develop    browserify src/ts/index.ts --debug      -p [ tsify --inlineSourceMap -p ./tsconfig.json ] > lib/index.js
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify src/ts/index.ts -p licensify -p [ tsify -p ./tsconfig.json ] -g [ uglifyify --compress ] -t envify > lib/index.js
scripts.example: cross-env NODE_ENV=develop browserify src/ts/example.ts --debug -p [ tsify --inlineSourceMap -p ./tsconfig.json ] > example/example.js
